template.name: All_Gene_Homolog
template.title: All homologs of a specific gene in any organism

query.name: All_Gene_Homolog
query.longDescription: Retrieve the homologs of a specific gene in any organism as determined by inParanoid

template.name: Chromosome_seq
template.title: Sequence of a chromosome or scaffold.

template.name: Diversity_Affected_Gene
template.title: Variants Near an Annotated Gene.

query.name: Diversity_Affected_Gene
query.view: Location.locatedOn.primaryIdentifier Location.start Location.feature.name Location.feature.reference Location.feature.alternate Location.feature.consequences.type.type Location.feature.consequences.transcript.name

template.name: Diversity_Affected_Gene_Type
template.title: Variants Near an Annotated Gene of a specific type.

query.name: Diversity_Affected_Gene_Type
query.view: Location.locatedOn.primaryIdentifier Location.start Location.feature.name Location.feature.reference Location.feature.alternate Location.feature.consequences.type.type Location.feature.consequences.substitution Location.feature.consequences.transcript.name

template.name: Diversity_Range
template.title: Variants within Range of Genomic Coordinates.

query.name: Diversity_Range
query.longDescription: This is an example query for finding variants within a range of genomic coordinates. Be aware our webservices will not give results for queries that will return results for large ranges. This query is suitable for regions approximately the size of 1 gene.
query.constraintLogic: A and B and C and D

template.name: Families_of_a_Specified_Organism

query.name: Families_of_a_Specified_Organism
query.longDescription: Display the peptide sequences for a specific protein family.

query.name: Family_Consensus_Sequence
query.longDescription: Display the consensus sequence for a specific protein family.

template.name: Family_KOG_Member_1
template.title: Protein Families of a Specific KOG Letter Identifier

template.name: GO-Annotations
template.title: GO-Annotations

query.name: GO-Annotations
query.view: Gene.primaryIdentifier Gene.secondaryIdentifier Gene.length Gene.chromosomeLocation.start Gene.chromosomeLocation.end Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.identifier Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.name Gene.goAnnotation.ontologyTerm.description Gene.briefDescription
query.longDescription: Look up the GO terms associated with a gene, or use a saved list of genes and look up the GO terms associated with all genes on the list.

template.name: GO-Annotations_Basic
template.title: GO-Annotations_Basic

query.name: GO-Annotations_Basic
query.longDescription: Look up the GO terms associated with a gene, or use a saved list of genes and look up the GO terms associated with all genes on the list.

template.name: GOTerm
template.title: GO term lookup.

query.name: GOTerm
query.longDescription: Either enter a GO term into the identifier box or create a list of GO identifiers from another query or paste into the list box. If supplying a list, type the name of the saved list pulldown menu.

template.name: GO_children
template.title: Children of a specific GO term

query.name: GO_children
query.longDescription: Find the direct child terms of a specific GO term

template.name: GO_children_1
template.title: Children of a specific GO term

query.name: GO_children_1
query.longDescription: Find the direct child terms of a specific GO term

template.name: GO_term_with_children_count
template.title: Retrieve the child terms of a specific GO terms and the number of genes within that class of GO terms

template.name: GO_terms_for_genes_1
template.title: GO Terms for a gene or list of genes

query.name: GO_terms_for_genes_1
query.longDescription: Look up the GO terms associated with a gene, or use a saved list of genes and look up the GO terms associated with all genes on the list.

template.name: GO_terms_for_proteins
template.title: GO Terms for a protein or list of proteins

query.name: GO_terms_for_proteins
query.longDescription: Look up the GO terms associated with a single protein, or save a list of proteins and look up GO terms for all proteins on your list.

template.name: GO_terms_for_transcript
template.title: GO Terms for a transcript or list of transcripts

query.name: GO_terms_for_transcript
query.longDescription: Look up the GO terms associated with a single gene with a specified transcript, or save a list of transcripts and look up GO terms for all genes with transcripts on your list.
